short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for communicating with patients

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pocketpills' Care Team's Plugin for communicating with customers and works only in conjunction with the internal application. The plugin is used internally by the team to make and receive calls and chats and works, capture the information about the intent and reason so that it can be passed on to the next agent and also for internal analytics to determine most common reasons for communications.
